extendedInfo.description: â»â»ââ Your PRO Key for "Shake - Screen Off"!Power key is hard to press? Lock screen with a shake!The Pro version removes all ads contained in free version!It is very easy to use to help lock your screen with a simple shake! With "Shake - Screen Off", you don't need to press power button again when you want your device turn to sleep mode. Just a "Shake" make it!Just keep this key app in phone, the free version won't push any ads to your device.IMPORTANT:**** How to Uninstall (Android2.2~)1. Open "Settings" in Home;2. Select "Location & Security-> Select device adminstrators";3. Disable permission of ShakeOff;4. Uninstall ShakeOff normally;**** Please notice that if you install it on your sdcard, the application might stop working.!!!!! IMPORTANT !!!!!Reboot your device to make sure all ads are removed from your phone.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Works great. No ads is nice. I have to adjust the sensibility every time I update though. Worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User
